home.realTimeNoteTaking: Alt takes notes and organizes them in real-time
home.subDescription: For school lectures, presentations, even when your internet is unstable.
home.subDescriptionCta: Use alt for real-time note-taking and lecture summaries, completely free.

privacy.title: Strict Security
privacy.description: All content is stored on your PC. Works offline, and we don't even have servers.

realTimeTranslation.title: Real-time Translation
realTimeTranslation.description: Instantly translates lecture content to help you understand better.

aiEditing.title: AI Editing
aiEditing.description: AI refines your transcribed content to ensure accurate records.

completelyFree.title: Completely Free
completelyFree.description: 300 minutes per month limit? Lectures can last hours a day. With alt, use 1,000 hours and pay $0.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: It's free as there are no servers or APIs at all.

localAi.title: Local AI
localAi.description: The AI model runs on your PC. Nothing goes in, nothing goes out.

privacy.title: Strict Security
privacy.description: All your data is stored on your PC.

performance.title: High AI Performance
performance.description: Minimized memory usage and battery consumption.

about.title: Team
about.mission:
Starting with alt, we aim to create tools that maximize individual productivity based on On-Device AI.
If you're interested in building together, let's have a casual coffee chat.

pricing.title:
If you want to use top-tier models,
subscribe to the Pro plan
pricing.subtitle: Don't misunderstand. Alt is still completely free with no time limits.

free.name: Free
free.highlight: The AI model runs on your PC
coreFeatures: All data is processed on your PC
otherFeatures: Meeting minutes and PDF AI summary

pro.name: Pro
coreFeatures: Latest frontier models applied to AI features such as summarization, translation, AI chat (coming soon)
otherFeatures: Instant access to Gemini 3 Pro, GPT 5.1
No need to install heavy models
